translations: n.婴儿车；送牛奶的手推车；平底船（pram 的复数）

phrs.translation: 婴儿车, 妊娠风险评估监测系统

sentences.sentence: Oh, no; girls, you know, are much too clever to fall out of their prams.
sentences.translation: 哦，不；你知道，女孩子都很聪明，不会从婴儿车里掉下来的。

sentences.sentence: We were in baby prams once, with our mothers pushing the prams;
sentences.translation: 小时候的我们坐在婴儿车里，是妈妈推着我们走。

sentences.sentence: The convention centre boasts nearly as many mothers with prams as heavy-metal-T-shirted, body-pierced teens.
sentences.translation: 会展中心充斥的推着婴儿车的妈妈们和穿着重金属T恤，身上穿环的青年几乎差不多数量。
